name: contains-ads
description: Checks if the specified url contains advertisements
author: Jensen Bernard <jensenbernard5@gmail.com> (twitter.com/Jense5_)

scripts.update: rm lists/*.txt || true && curl https://github.com/brave/adblock-rust/raw/master/data/easylist.to/easylist/easylist.txt -o lists/easylist.txt && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/brave/adblock-rust/master/data/uBlockOrigin/unbreak.txt -o lists/unbreak.txt && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/brave/adblock-rust/master/data/uBlockOrigin/resources.txt -o lists/resources.txt && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/brave/adblock-rust/master/data/brave/coin-miners.txt -o lists/miners.txt
